author: Tri_pod_king
title: Ooh, DIBS!
review:
Are you kidding me? I'm the first one to review this set? This set is so cute! I got three of them at my beach house, and the rest is history. This set had a lack of pieces, but it was still awesome! It included a decent minifig, and a good constuction. Ooh, did I spell that right? Oh, well anyway this is a good little set and is enjoyable to build and play with.

                                                       -Be Excellent to each other,
                                                                     Tri-pod king
